title: Almost 50 Years Into the Crypto Wars, Encryption’s Opponents Are Still Wrong
description: Attempts by the US and UK to require backdoors in secure messaging apps are a huge step in the wrong direction. Right now, we need more encryption, not less.

title: A Leaked Memo Shows TikTok Knows It Has a Labor Problem
description: Internal TikTok documents reveal that the company is preparing for scrutiny of its supply chain. This comes after a Kenyan judge cleared the way for moderators to sue Meta.

title: AI Giants Pledge to Allow External Probes of Their Algorithms, Under a New White House Pact
description: Leading AI developers including Google and OpenAI promised the Biden administration to check for problems such as biased output. The agreement is not legally binding.
